p: A total amount of 0.25 g of NEDD was mixed in sufficient deionized water to produce 250 ml of 0.10% of the NEDD solution. Then, 1% sulfanilamide solution was prepared by dissolving 2.50 g of sulfanilamide in 5% phosphoric acid to produce 250 ml. Finally, 500 ml of Griess reagent was prepared by mixing NEDD solution and sulfanilamide solution which was then stored in a refrigerator and used before 8 hr.
